title: Pity me not - this have I known always

content.question: The statement at the beginning of line 9 (“This . . . always”) serves to

choices.label: assert the speaker’s nostalgia for the natural processes described in lines 1-8
emphasize the speaker’s conscious awareness of the losses described in lines 1-8
convey the speaker’s devotion to the “you” mentioned in line 8
contrast the speaker’s knowledge with the ignorance of the “you” in line 8

content.answer: emphasize the speaker’s conscious awareness of the losses described in lines 1-8

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
